channel.title: RSBot Version 1 Update 524 - GuildMiner
channel.description:
Download RSBot Version 1 Update 524 - [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/171817556/RSBot_1_-_524.zip]Here[/url]
[b]DO NOT SEND IT AFTER YOU'VE LOGGED IN TO A FRIEND! THERE IS AN ACCOUNT FOLDER WITH YOUR USERNAME AND PASSWORD. GIVE THEM THE DIRECT LINK![/b]
[b]Features[/b]
Starts in bank or mining guild. 100% Smoking rock detection. Many anti-bans [This is not the way it sounds. An anti-ban is a random click on what you're mining to convince the RuneScape server your logged in and not AFK.] Anti-Randoms - Does MOST (not all) random events. [The only one it doesn't support is The quiz one.] Bot intelligence - Knows when inventory is full, knows your coords, knows when to stop and do random event.
Script is attatched due to insufficient character space.
Make sure its saved as TenacGuildMiner.java then when you compile in the script folder it should've created a class. If successful it should be in the drop down menu on client under the 'mining.'
For more scripts visit Rsbot.org
~ Java Is My Life™
Credits - Tenac for his wonderful script. I take 0.1 credit for finding it and posting it XD
EDIT: Fixed Link, Thanks Ron

item.title: RSBot Version 1 Update 524 - GuildMiner
item.dc:creator: @ringer24 ringer24
item.description:
@ringer24 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Life™, post:10, topic:249995”][quote author=ringer24 link=topic=329599.msg2577173#msg2577173 date=1229033211]
I was being sarcastic because you posted it in the SCAR section moron…
Plus since its open source anyone could make a password stealer and re-upload it and say “rs bot - best bot on rs!”. Plus they could reuse their code in the other updates.

[/quote]

If we get anymore I’ll suggest the SCAR board be renamed to RuneScape Autoing and have SCAR + RSBot in 2 sections xD

Rofl, it’s not a password stealer go to rsbot.org and the link is the same. If it was a password scammer would all those members be registered there? GF, GTFO.[/quote]

Never said it was I was just saying anyone with any java knowledge at all could easily send the account .xml files to an email. Read before you post?

Read full topic
